<C_GCIC [id= "captcha_1"] [name= "Captcha Matemático 1"]>
    !! El encabezado de la página que tendrá mi captcha
    <C_HEAD>
       <C_LINK
          [href="https://www.mclibre.org/consultar/htmlcss/html/html-etiquetas.html"]>
       </C_LINK>
          !! El título de mi página
       <C_TITLE> Mi primer Captcha Matemático</C_TITLE>
    </C_HEAD>
    !! El cuerpo de la página
    <C_BODY [background= "blue"] >
        !! un título simple estilizado
        <C_H1 [id= "title_1"] [text-align= "center"] [color= "#7eff33"] >
           Mi primer Captcha Matemático
        </C_H1>
	<C_SPAM [id= "mostrar_1"] [text-align= "center"] [color= "#3366ff"] >
           ¿ Qué resultado genera la operación siguiente: 5+5 ?
        </C_SPAM>
	<C_INPUT [type= "text"] [text-align= "center"] [id= "entrada_1"] ></C_INPUT>
	<C_BUTTON [id= "boton_1"] [onclick= "PROCESS_calc()"] [background="green"]>            
           Procesar...
        </C_BUTTON>
	<C_SELECT [id= "select_1"] [text-align= "center"] [color= "#7eff33"]>
		<C_OPTION>una opcion</C_OPTION>
	</C_SELECT>
	<C_TEXTAREA [cols= "10"] [rows= "5"] [id= "txta_1"] ></C_TEXTAREA>
< C_IMG [src="https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/4777732b-8c02-4025-a9a1-bf76f80dc309/d38loh6-b687c393-a51b-43ce-a48c-6db29a36ffbe.jpg?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..b__Db73zC8l9j2FhUCW1j7MGLQBvLT-kYAHiHURKxGM"]></C_IMG>
	<C_DIV><C_INPUT [type= "text"] [text-align= "center"] [id= "entrada_1"] ></C_INPUT>
	<C_BUTTON [id= "boton_1"] [onclick= "PROCESS_calc()"] [background="green"]>            
           Procesar...
        </C_BUTTON>
< C_IMG [src="https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/4777732b-8c02-4025-a9a1-bf76f80dc309/d38loh6-b687c393-a51b-43ce-a48c-6db29a36ffbe.jpg?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..b__Db73zC8l9j2FhUCW1j7MGLQBvLT-kYAHiHURKxGM"]></C_IMG><C_SCRIPTING>
           ON_LOAD () [
              INSERT('<C_INPUT [type= "text"] [text-align= "left"] [id= "entrada_3"] ></C_INPUT>');
           ]
</C_SCRIPTING></C_DIV>

    </C_BODY>
</C_GCIC>
